strategy: Death Guard armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Death Guard Core and Elite formations, as well as all Traitor Titan formations, have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Death Guard, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: Death Guard Retinue
formations.units: Four Plague Marines, three Chaos Space Marines, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

sections.name: Death Guard Elite Formations
sections.description: One Elite formation may be fielded per Core formation

formations.name: Chosen
formations.units: Four Chosen, two Death Guard Rhinos

formations.name: Death Guard Terminators
formations.units: Four Blightlord Terminators, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

sections.name: Daemon Engine Formations
sections.description: Two Daemon Engine formations may be fielded per Core formation

formations.name: Nurgle Defiler Pack
upgrades: Add up to three Desecrators for 50 points each

sections.name: Traitor Titans, Plague Zombies and Chaos Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Plaguehounds
upgrades: Add one Plaguehound Titan for 250 points

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Greater Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Greater Daemon Pool points. The first one is free.

upgrades.title: Death Guard Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace the Chaos Lord with a Warlord
Replace the Chaos Lord and its unit with a Daemon Prince of Nurgle
Add up to four Death Guard Rhinos (Retinue only)
Add up to four Death Guard Land Raiders
(No more than needed to transport the formation with no space left over)

items.name: Daemonic Pact
items.description: Add Daemonic Pact to the formation, and one point to the Lesser Daemon Pool

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add two Death Guard Dreadnoughts to the formation

items.name: Champion
items.description: Add one Champion of Nurgle character to the formation

items.name: Stalker
items.description: Add one Death Guard Stalker to the formation

items.name: Havocs
items.description: Replace three Chaos Space Marines with three Havocs

items.name: Plague Marines
items.description: Replace three Chaos Space Marines with three Plague Marines
